metadata.feature_description: Manage article metadata, custom fields, and article type categorization

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki Test page and enter Edit mode
steps.expected: Wiki module visible with Create article option
steps.actual: Wiki module displayed in edit mode with Create article button visible

steps.action: Click Create article button to open article creation dialog
steps.expected: Article creation dialog opens with Article Type dropdown
steps.actual: Dialog opened with Article Type dropdown showing 'Select a type...' and multiple options including Teams/Groups, Animals, Misc., Architecture, Geography, Procedures, Concepts, Media, Books, Awards, Events, People

steps.expected: People article type selected in dropdown
steps.actual: Successfully selected 'People' as the article type

steps.action: Fill in article details (title, content, tags) and click Publish
steps.expected: Article created with selected article type
steps.actual: Article 'Test Article for Metadata' was created successfully with Article Type 'People' and tags 'test, metadata'

steps.action: Verify article appears in article list
steps.expected: Article visible in wiki article list
steps.actual: Article 'Test Article for Metadata' visible in list with tags 'test, metadata' displayed

steps.action: Navigate to article detail page to access metadata editor
steps.expected: Article page displays with Wiki Article module and Wiki MetaData module showing metadata and Edit link
steps.actual: Article detail page at /Wiki-Test/Test-Article-for-Metadata shows empty page without Wiki modules configured

issues: Article detail pages do not have Wiki Article or Wiki MetaData modules configured, preventing access to metadata editor functionality

steps.action: Access metadata editor to edit metadata values
steps.expected: MetaData editor dialog opens with Image and MetaData tabs allowing editing of metadata fields
steps.actual: Unable to access metadata editor - article detail page does not display Wiki modules

issues: Cannot access metadata editor due to missing Wiki modules on article detail pages

steps.action: Test validation when creating article with missing required fields
steps.expected: Validation error displayed for missing content
steps.actual: When attempting to publish article, 'Text is required' validation error was displayed for the content field, demonstrating proper validation of required fields

observations: Code review confirms MetaDataController.cs provides methods for GetMetaDataTypes, SetValue, and SetEnabled for metadata management
MetaDataEditor.ascx provides UI for editing metadata with tabs for Image and MetaData, supporting field types: date (0), text (1), URL (2), boolean (3), and multiline text (4)
MetaDataControl.ascx shows an 'Edit' link when CanEdit is true, which opens the metadata editor dialog
Article detail pages (child pages of Wiki Test) do not have Wiki modules configured, preventing testing of metadata display and editing

The article type dropdown includes 12 predefined types: Teams/Groups, Animals, Misc., Architecture, Geography, Procedures, Concepts, Media, Books/Magazines/Articles/Documents, Awards, Events, and People
Tags functionality works correctly - tags 'test, metadata' were successfully added to the article
Metadata inheritance and localization features exist in code (GetLocalizedContentMetaData, LocalizedKey property) but could not be tested via UI due to page configuration
